page.title: 04POPULATION IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: Area comprises part of Chipping Campden,Broad Campden,Ebrington and most of Paxford.It is estimated that adults in the area total 450,children and young persons under the age of 18 number approximately 50.As the area is part of four parishes,difficulty arises in calculating precise statistics.Deaths outnumber births and the ratio of young persons to adults (1:9)is low in an aging population with a trend towards smaller families. In a predominately farming community one generation often succeeds another resulting in a comparatively static population.There has been some movement into the district by older retiring people who have helped to restore and maintain properties which otherwise might have remained unoccupied.
